column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////This place was REALLY good
column2: the server was super nice all around but wasn't really attentive and made the experience kind of disappointing. We had to ask about 3-4 different people for water
column3: hot sauce and other things. It wasn't terrible but servers should be attentive to all customers. She only really cared about the bill and that's it but I will be back. (Food is five stars)
